summary: Eurostat Pharma Trade Data: Italy-USA Analysis 2024
Pharma Export Analysis: Eurostat vs ISTAT Data Reconciliation

message.content: look for the direct link from which i can download ISTAT data about export from ITA to USA

content.text: I'll help you find the direct link to download ISTAT data about exports from Italy to the USA.

input.query: ISTAT export data Italy USA download direct link

content.content:
Web search results for query: "ISTAT export data Italy USA download direct link"

Links: [{"title":"Istat","url":"https://www.istat.it/en/"},{"title":"Open Data – Istat","url":"https://www.istat.it/en/data/open-data/"},{"title":"Istat.it Exports","url":"https://www.istat.it/en/archivio/exports"},{"title":"Databases – Istat","url":"https://www.istat.it/en/data/databases/"},{"title":"Data – Istat","url":"https://www.istat.it/en/data/"},{"title":"ISTAT - Data Portals","url":"https://dataportals.org/portal/national-institute-of-statistics-italy/"},{"title":"istat: Download and Manipulate Data from Istat","url":"https://cran.r-project.org/package=istat"},{"title":"Economic and financial data for Italy – Istat","url":"https://www.istat.it/nsdp/"},{"title":"Istat.it Imports","url":"https://www.istat.it/en/archivio/imports"},{"title":"Istat Statistics","url":"http://dati.istat.it/?lang=en"}]

Based on the search results, I found information about ISTAT (Italian National Institute of Statistics) data access and export data. Here's what I found regarding Italy-USA export data and download options:

## ISTAT Data Access Points

ISTAT provides Foreign Trade Statistics data on Italy's trade flows with the rest of the World. The main access points for ISTAT export data are:

### Main Databases:
1. **Foreign Trade Statistics Database** - This contains data on Italy's trade flows with the rest of the World
2. **IstatData** - The new Istat database for the dissemination of aggregated data with more than 1,500 time series organised into 22 thematic areas

### Data Access Options:
- The access and downloading of data and information are free
- All Istat data disseminated through corporate data warehouse I.Stat can be downloaded in CSV format
- Istat has prepared an "End Point" to allow the machine to machine use of data contained in the corporate data warehouse

### Key URLs Found:
- Main ISTAT data portal: https://www.istat.it/en/data/
- ISTAT databases: https://www.istat.it/en/data/databases/
- I.Stat database: http://dati.istat.it/?lang=en
- Open Data portal: https://www.istat.it/en/data/open-data/

### Recent Export Data:
In June 2025 import +5.1%, export +6.0% compared with May; the trade balance was +5,391 million euro

For specific Italy-USA export data with direct download links, you would need to navigate to the Foreign Trade Statistics database on the ISTAT website, where you can filter by country (USA) and download the data in CSV format.

## ISTAT Data Access Points

ISTAT provides Foreign Trade Statistics data on Italy's trade flows with the rest of the World. The main access points for ISTAT export data are:

### Main Databases:
1. **Foreign Trade Statistics Database** - This contains data on Italy's trade flows with the rest of the World
2. **IstatData** - The new Istat database for the dissemination of aggregated data with more than 1,500 time series organised into 22 thematic areas

### Data Access Options:
- The access and downloading of data and information are free
- All Istat data disseminated through corporate data warehouse I.Stat can be downloaded in CSV format
- Istat has prepared an "End Point" to allow the machine to machine use of data contained in the corporate data warehouse

### Key URLs Found:
- Main ISTAT data portal: https://www.istat.it/en/data/
- ISTAT databases: https://www.istat.it/en/data/databases/
- I.Stat database: http://dati.istat.it/?lang=en
- Open Data portal: https://www.istat.it/en/data/open-data/

### Recent Export Data:
In June 2025 import +5.1%, export +6.0% compared with May; the trade balance was +5,391 million euro

For specific Italy-USA export data with direct download links, you would need to navigate to the Foreign Trade Statistics database on the ISTAT website, where you can filter by country (USA) and download the data in CSV format.
